item.title: Sofia's Trams
item.description: It has been almost a decade, since I last set foot in the city center of Bulgaria‚Äôs capital, Sofia. Although I fly home regularly, Sofia‚Äôs Airport is just an intermediary stop on my ultimate route to my hometown. This time was different. My wife and I flew for the wedding of one of our best friends, and since we had a whole day to spare, we decided to take a walk through the centre of the City of Trams.
Good morning from Augsburg, Germany üëãüèº Not many people around (expected for the second day of Easter), but we got a beatufil sunshine and a great view.
A view to live for! üòç Sendlinger Tor | Munich
